description.narrative: This activity (Rwanda Programme evidence facility) is a component of Rwanda Programme evidence facility reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £1,633,861. This component benefits Rwanda, and works in the following sector(s): Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Aegis Trust, Coffey International Development, Crown Agents Limited, DAI Europe, Ernst & Young, IMC Worldwide, MannionDaniels, Oxford Policy Management, United Nations Development Programme (UNDP). The start date is 25-06-2014 and the end date is 30-10-2020.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
